Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Detroit in 1969...
Traded from Detroit to Houston on 6/9/1969 (Going to HOU: RF K. Griffey Sr., P C. Vaughan. Going to DET: P S. Bahnsen)...
Had first career hit on 6/4/1971, off Milt Pappas (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1972, off John E. Miller (PHI)...
Injured on 9/29/1973 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
